attributes.long-description:
Download the free Jaunt VR app and watch over 150 premium, cinematic virtual reality experiences across your favorite genres: MUSIC, SPORTS, FILM, and TRAVEL!

MUST-SEE CONTENT:
- Watch the 5-part Invisible series by Doug Liman, Director of The Bourne Identity and Edge of Tomorrow
- Get into college football like never before with ESPN Gameday
- Enjoy VR documentaries Inside Syria and Inside North Korea by ABC News
- Be there with adventure athletes in amazing locations in the Home Turf series
- Be on stage with Paul McCartney and more in the Music World
- Get spooked in the The Game, a Jaunt Original, in the Horror World

VR Games may cause some players to experience motion sickness.

Use of PSN and SEN account are subject to the Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy (see terms at sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service & sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
Online features may be terminated at any time.
*Online multiplayer requires a PlayStation®Plus membership.

1 player
DUALSHOCK®4
Online Play (Required)
PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

© 2017 Jaunt Inc.
attributes.name: Jaunt VR: Enjoy Premium Cinematic VR Experiences
